summary: Halifax is the capital and biggest city in Nova Scotia, Canada. It has over 500,000 people in its metropolitan area. The city was formed in 1996 by joining four smaller areas. Halifax is an important place for business in Atlantic Canada, with many jobs in government, education, healthcare, and shipping. Major companies like the Department of National Defence and Dalhousie University are based there. Rural parts of the city also have industries like farming, fishing, and mining.
title: Halifax, Nova Scotia
